name: Julin's Secret World
description:
Julin can't stop dreaming can you help Julin to get out of his dreams ? 

Need 

CPU : Intel Core i3 Haswell or equivalent

GPU : NVIDIA GT 1030 or equivalent
RAM : 4Gb
Disk Space : 5Gb

Recommanded
CPU : Intel Core i5 Haswell or equivalent
GPU : NVIDIA GTX 850 or equivalent
RAM : 8Gb
Disk Space : 5Gb
